Texts.Eng: <Great joy is felt by this being. Appreciation will be shown with gratuitous monetary payment. Fleshlings appreciate such gestures. With it you could purchase goods and services.>

<^red;A voice speaks in your head:^reset; Most upsetting. Expedition was a failure. Could not locate ^orange;Ancient Remote^reset; to sell at exorbitant price. If mortal biped locates one, I would be most grateful to purchase it.>
Bring an ^orange;Ancient Remote^reset; to the ^green;Shadow Shop^reset; at the ^orange;Science Outpost^reset;
